name: Ghost Orchestra
description:
A very mini game I made for Audio for Digital Games class, inspired by Louie Zong's Ghost Choir, which you can find here: https://twitter.com/everydaylouie/status/1054436598425706504?lang=en

Use A, S, D, F, G, H, J, K on your keyboard to make the ghosties sing. You can hold down the keys longer to make them sing longer! To make a new recording, press R. To play back a recording just made, press SPACE. There are four tracks with different tempo, numbered at the bottom right of the screen. Press any of them to help time your singing ghosts. To stop the tempo tracks from playing, press the Pause button.

Have fun and thank you for playing!

The Snipster
